description: This source file provides utility functions for DHCP protocol handling, including socket creation, message sending, receiving, ARP record insertion, and diagnostic data dumps. It is specifically used for DHCP operations in network management.

methods.name: void dhcp_send(int s,const unsigned char * msg,unsigned int size,struct sockaddr_in dest_addr)
methods.description: Sends a DHCP message via a socket to a specified destination address.

methods.name: void insert_arp_record(int s,const char * device_name,struct sockaddr_in ip_addr,ui8 htype,ui8 hlen,ui8 * chaddr)
methods.description: Inserts an ARP record into the ARP table, used when DHCP message is unicast.

methods.name: int dhcp_create_socket(int port,const char * device_name)
methods.description: Creates and binds a DHCP socket to a specified port and network device.

methods.name: int dhcp_recvfrom_to(int s,void * buf,size_t len,int flags,struct sockaddr_in * from,struct in_addr * to)
methods.description: Receives a DHCP packet and retrieves source and destination IP addresses.

methods.name: void dump_data(const unsigned char * data,size_t size)
methods.description: Dumps binary data in a hexadecimal and ASCII format for diagnostics.

methods.name: void dump_data_short(const unsigned char * data,size_t size)
methods.description: Prints binary data in a short hex and ASCII format for diagnostics.

methods.name: void dump_mac_addr(const void * param)
methods.description: Prints a MAC address in human-readable form.

methods.name: void dump_ip_addr(const void * param)
methods.description: Prints an IP address in dotted decimal notation.

methods.name: void dump_ip_list(const unsigned char * data,size_t size)
methods.description: Prints a list of IP addresses.

methods.name: void dump_dhcp_option(const struct dhcp_option * p_option)
methods.description: Prints details of a DHCP option based on its type.

methods.name: void dump_dhcp_option_list(const struct dhcp_option * option_list)
methods.description: Prints a list of DHCP options.

methods.name: void dump_dhcp_msg(const struct dhcp_msg * msg,const struct dhcp_option_info * opts)
methods.description: Prints the full details of a DHCP message, including headers and options.
